title: Question about Hextech Mystery Champion Permanent tokens
body: How long do we have to wait after Zoe's release in order to get her through HMCP tokens?

replies.body: New releases usually won't appear immediately in hextech loot.  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you should give it about a day.
